description:
The mobile web-vs-native debate rages onâ€“who's winning? How can we create mobile experiences that are accessible and reliable to people with disabilities? In this talk, we'll dive head-first into the mobile debate and reemerge informed on how we can use our skills as web developers to create brilliant mobile apps.
---------------

title: How to Win at Mobile Accessibility
